Moonworks:LittleGull.NAME: 小海鸥
DESCRIPTIONS: 在你的回合开始时, 每打出一张 #y乔纳桑·速袭 或 #y大群的海鸥, 对一个随机敌人造成 #b2 到 #b7 点伤害.

Moonworks:BrokenBomb.NAME: 坏掉的炸弹
DESCRIPTIONS: 每打出 #b10 张 #y技能牌 ，提高你的 #ymoonworks:Norma 等级 #b1 级并且将 #b1张 #y烧毁星球之光 加入你的手牌。

Moonworks:SBBomb.NAME: 星破炸弹

Moonworks:GoldenDie.NAME: 金色骰子
DESCRIPTIONS: 提高 #y礼物卡余额， #yGift 牌余额提高 #b50%.

Moonworks:Homemark.FLAVOR: 它尝起来是橙味的，很神秘。

. 在战斗外右击它可以花费 #b

Moonworks:HealPanel.NAME: Heal Panel
Moonworks:HealPanel.FLAVOR: Recommended by 0 out of 1 doctors wearing lab coats. NL Part 1 of a series, can you collect them all?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a #ymoonworks:Norma level, heal #b1 HP.

Moonworks:BonusPanel.NAME: Panel Panel
Moonworks:BonusPanel.FLAVOR: Tiny, but stars are stars. NL Part 2 of a series, can you collect them all?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a #ymoonworks:Norma level, gain #b1 energy.

Moonworks:DrawPanel.NAME: Draw Panel
Moonworks:DrawPanel.FLAVOR: Imagine only being able to hold 3 cards in your hand... NL Part 3 of a series, can you collect them all?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a #ymoonworks:Norma level, draw #b1 card.

Moonworks:DamagePanel.NAME: Damage Panel
Moonworks:DamagePanel.FLAVOR: Ouch! What did I just step on? NL Part 4 of a series, can you collect them all?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a #ymoonworks:Norma level, deal #b7 damage to ALL enemies.

Moonworks:HomePanel.NAME: Home Panel
Moonworks:HomePanel.FLAVOR: If you get homesick, just step on it. NL The final panel, at last!
DESCRIPTIONS: Doubles the effectiveness of all other Panels.
